channel.title: [Delta]How to add more player rights?
channel.description: How do I add more player rights to my delta server? I want things like 3 = Admin, 2 = Global Moderator, 4 = Co-owner, and 5 = Owner.

item.title: [Delta]How to add more player rights?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:387179”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=482980.msg3537173#msg3537173 date=1300631913]
Actually there kinda already are more rights. You just have to make functions for them. And possibly change something in the client so they also have crowns next to their name.
[/quote]
ANd, what are you trying to say?[/quote]
I mean that there are already more rights. You just have add options for them. Like, if u make a command for player rights 50, then a player with the rights 50 can use that command. I hope u can understand what I am trying to explain.

Read full topic
